DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Party Stamp Kit (3 colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Party Stamp Kit is a perfect way to make your next party fun and exciting. The Kit includes 3 face paint stamps (peppermint, candy, cupcake) and 3 of Snazaroo's 2 ml face paints (Turquoise, Orange, Fuchsia Pink).
Snazaroo's specially designed EVA stamps are perfect for use on children. The stamps are approximately one and a half inches at the widest point and one inch thick. Easy to use even for beginner users.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: This Stamp Kit will paint about 750 cheek art designs.
Includes 3 face paint stamps (peppermint, candy, cupcake) and 3 of Snazaroo's 2 ml face paints (Turquoise, Orange, Fuchsia Pink).
One of the most popular face paints in the world
